title: User tries to upload a duplicate batch name
name: User tries to upload a duplicate batch name

test-steps.description: [1] {customer-1=006500, batch-file-1=valid-batch-1, date-1=today, customer-2=006500, batch-file-2=valid-batch-1, date-2=today, result=rejected, message-code=C1}

children.description: Given customer <customer-1> has uploaded a batch file <batch-file> on date <date-1>
When <customer-2> uploads a file called <batch-file-2> on date <date-2>
Then the uploaded file should be processed with result <result>
And the error message should be <message-code>
Given a user wants to test validation for <no. of transactions>
When the file is uploaded with fewer number of payments (record type 10) as specified in the header

Then the uploaded file is Rejected with the error message C16
Error Message: ‘Number of transactions in the header record must equal the number of transactions in the file.’
Given a user wants to test validation for the <customer code>
And customer code contains all zeros
When the file is loaded

Then the uploaded file is Rejected
 And the error message is returned ‘Customer Code is not valid.’ – C13
Given a user provides input file which is structurally valid
And an invalid FRT =  blank
When file gets loaded
Then the relevant transaction's status is rejected
And error message is returned 'Funds Release Time must be in the 24 hour format and in 15 minute increments.'
Given a user provides input file which is structurally valid
And an invalid Amount = not numeric
When file gets loaded
Then the relevant transaction's status is rejected
And error message is returned 'Amounts must be numeric, greater than 0 but less than or equal to $999,999,999,999.99'
